item.title: ZMR250 Quadcopter
item.author: Nathan Petersen
item.description: Background I got into the R/C hobby at a very young age, mainly with R/C cars. They weren’t that nice, since I was so young, but boy were they fun. I remember I got a truck one year for Christmas and immediately started driving (and crashing) it. Since we were having Christmas at my grandparents, they didn’t really like me hitting their walls with it, so they hid it from me for a while.
